dcterms:creator: Pannagadatta K. Shivaswamy
Chiranjib Bhattacharyya
Alexander J. Smola
dcterms:description: The robust SVM problem is designed to handle binary classification problems with uncertain feature vectors, where the constraints are represented as second order cone constraints.
dcterms:title: Robust SVM problem

dcterms:creator: Martin Andersen
Joachim Dahl
Zhang Liu
Lieven Vandenberghe
dcterms:description: Random datasets generated for robust SVM problems, sampled from a uniform distribution and used to test optimization algorithms.
dcterms:title: Random data sets for robust SVM

dcterms:creator: Ivor W. Tsang
András Kocsor
James T. Kwok
dcterms:description: Core vector machine dataset used for testing simpler core vector machine algorithms that utilize enclosing balls.
dcterms:title: Core vector machine dataset

dcterms:creator: José Luis Morales
Jorge Nocedal
dcterms:description: Dataset used for testing the L-BFGS-B algorithm, which is designed for large-scale bound constrained optimization.
dcterms:title: L-BFGS-B algorithm dataset
